title: Check Tutoring Center Hours
description: A student wants to know the operating hours for the campus writing center.

tasks.description: Identify the specific tutoring center the student is asking about.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the student means the 'Writing Center'.

tasks.description: Look up the hours for the Writing Center on the university website or internal knowledge base.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the hours are M-F, 9 AM - 5 PM.

tasks.description: Communicate the hours to the student and ask if they need to schedule an appointment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the information and offers further assistance.
